import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import blogpost from '../../../data/blog.json'; import { getBlog, getAuthor, getCategories, getTags, postnavigation } from '../../../helper/bloghelper'; import Sidebar from '../../layouts/Blogsidebar'; class Content extends Component { render() { const blogId = this.props.blogId; const item = getBlog(blogId); return (
{/* Blog Loop Start */}
{getCategories(item.categories).map((category, i) => ( {category.title} ))}

{item.title}

    {getAuthor(item.author).map((author, i) => (
  • by {author.name}
    • ))}
  • {item.postdate}
  • {item.reviews.length} Comments
Related Tags
    {getTags(item.tags).map((tags, i) => (
  • {tags.title}
    • ))}
Social Share
{postnavigation(blogpost, blogpost.findIndex(item => parseInt(item.id) === parseInt(blogId)))}

Related Post

{blogpost.filter(post => { return parseInt(post.id) !== parseInt(blogId) && post.categories.some(r => item.categories.includes(r)) }).slice(0, 2).map((post, i) => (
{post.postdate}

{post.title.slice(0, 37)}

{post.shortdescription.slice(0, 100)}

))}
{getAuthor(item.author).map((author, i) => (
Written by

{author.name}

{author.longdescription}

))}

{item.reviews.length} Comments

    {item.reviews.map((review, i) => (
  • {getAuthor(review.user).map((user, i) => (
    ))}
    {getAuthor(review.user).map((user, i) => (
    {user.name}
    ))} {review.date} Reply

    {review.comment}

      {review.replies.map((reply, i) => (
    • {getAuthor(reply.user).map((user, i) => (
      ))}
      {getAuthor(reply.user).map((user, i) => (
      {user.name}
      ))} {reply.date} Reply

      {reply.comment}

      • ))}
    • ))}
